segments.text: I see the boy is really going for it, trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, it's making me anxious just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl is so excited, her hand outstretched for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely oblivious to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll ever notice the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is just pouring water onto the floor, creating a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit surprised that the woman hasn't noticed anything yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, it's kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel surprised by the woman's lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR
